name: Spherical
description:
Hi guys!

I've finally gotten the motivation to start work on another project. This is very much in early development stages, and currently there is only one level.  Let me know of any bugs you may have found,  ideas you have to improve it,  Etc... There is a discussion board up, so comment away!

Music is by Makkon and TheDashDub:
https://www.youtube.com/user/makkon06/featured

https://www.youtube.com/user/TheDashDub/videos
